data.title: 16-Inch Halo Balayage Human Hair Extensions
data.meta_description: Buy 16 Inch - Halo Hair Extensions - Balayage. Fast shipping in Australia.
data.text:
About Our 16‚Äù Halo Hair Extensions - Human Hair - Balayage

Gain fuller, longer, thicker hair without any of the fuss of traditional hair extensions with the best Halo hair extensions available on the market. The 30-second Zala Halo hair extensions are the quickest and easiest way to take your hair from 0 to 100. The process is clip, glue, and damage free.

For a tutorial on how to style your halo extensions, you can view our tutorial video HERE.

Product Specifications

Halo - 1 piece set

Styling Tips:

Heat resistant up to 284F/140C.

Cut and heat style the way you desire.

We do not recommend bleaching your hair extensions, as this can compromise the integrity of the hair.

Care Tips:

We recommend only washing your Hair Extensions if they are holding an odour, or if they are holding product build up. Washing them too often can strip the moisture out of them. Maintaining the condition of your natural hair with good quality products is very important, as is keeping your Zala Hair Extensions in their first-day condition, by storing and maintaining them properly. Zala offers a protective hanger bag and silky storage pouch to store your extensions, while they are not being worn. For the best results, store the hair extension storage case in a dark and dry location, without exposure to direct sunlight.

Colour Match:

We offer a free shade match service, so you can find your perfect match before you purchase. Simply complete this form and upload 2-3 photos that show your hair in full length, and our shade match specialists will respond with your personalised results!

Returns & Exchanges:

If for any reason you need to return or exchange your goods, you can return within 30 days from the date of purchase. Refunds are calculated as the total order amount, minus shipping incurred by ZALA. The product hygiene tag must be in-tact around the product and they must be returned in unused condition. For full policy, Visit the Customer service page.

Length Guide

16 inch

Zala 16-inch hair extensions reach to the bust line. With 130g of 100% human remy hair, this is a popular length for those wanting a natural effect. A great choice for shorter length customers. Weaves enhance hair whilst looking ultra natural. Perfect for everyday wear and work styles

20 inch

Zala 20-inch hair extensions reach just past the bust line. With 150g of 100% human remy hair, this is a popular length for those wanting a longer natural effect. Great for shorter hair customers. Weaves enhance hair whilst looking ultra natural. Another perfect length for everyday wear and work styles. If you love extra thickness and volume, you may prefer our extra thick quad-weft clip-in set.

Shipping, Exchanges and Returns
